value:
Despite the ruin the Dolhr Empire
and its leader, Medeus, brought upon
Archanea, I was not to be executed.

Dolhr's assault crushed the capital.
Afterward, Bishop Boah and very
few others were allowed at my side.

As princess of Archanea, I chose the
hero worthy of wielding the Fire
Emblem: Prince Marth of Altea.

When Prince Marth of Altea, inheritor
of Anri's legacy, appeared, it was akin
to a beacon lighting my darkness.

When the Fire Emblem last changed
hands to save Archanea, it was not
without cost... Artemis's Curse.

I sense light in your heart, much like I
sense in $Nf...

Never give up. Fight, until the day you
restore light to our world.

I must not misjudge the duty laid at
my feet. I must ensure that Archanea
endures...that it is restored.

The Fire Emblem is a crest bestowed
only upon a true champion, a symbol
of divine authority...

The courage of countless souls has
inspired me. Now, it is I who must be
courageous.

I am Nyna, princess of Archanea. We
must join hands, end Dolhr's tyranny,
and restore the holy kingdom!

All members of the royal family were
killed in battle or executed when
Dolhr and Grust attacked...all but me.$k$pI was prepared to throw myself upon
the sword, but a man stopped me,
saying I had a duty to Archanea still...$k$pThat man was Camus, the Sable
Knight of Grust. In reality, my greatest
foe had saved my life.$k$pMy ability to escape the capital and
seek refuge with Lord Hardin was all
thanks to him. $k$pDespite the risks, he fought to keep
me from harm. Worry for his safety
possesses my every thought.$k$pIf only I could speak with him even
once more... Camus, I... My apologies.
This is neither the time nor place.$k$pPlease...I would value your discretion
regarding this conversation.
For peace.
I must not run.
There is no turning back.
I will continue on.
Ah... Camus...
Gather your strength.
I will aid you.
I am Nyna of House Archanea.

The Fire Emblem is bestowed upon a
true champion, one we believe has the
power to save the world.
With Linde's father gone, I will do everything within my power to keep her safe.
Camus... I hope I get to meet you again someday.
It will be difficult, but we must nevertheless fightâ€”until the day you restore light to our world.
You need me?
What must be done?
We should depart.
